name: Veryfi, Inc.
headline: APIs to Liberate Trapped Data in Unstructured Documents
description:
Veryfi is a Data Transformation Platform turning Documents into Data in Seconds with Accuracy & Speed Surpassing Humans.

Veryfi gives you a fully integrated suite of data transformation products for you to securely capture, extract and transform bills, receipts and invoices into structured data for use in your app, website or backoffice. To learn more https://www.veryfi.com/

ITS TIME TO BUILD
Veryfi's developer friendly toolkits enable superior products that automate Expense Management, AP/Bill Pay, Bookkeeping and provide consumer spend behavior in Market Research

Invoices, Bills & POs
10 mins of data entry per invoice? No way! 5 seconds and it's done. Untap a goldmine of data down to line-items.

Expense Receipts
No more painful data entry for expense reimbursement. Bonus: comply with new data privacy regulations.

FMCG/CPG Receipts
Data is the new oil. Understand consumer spend across retail from SKUs in seconds.

Hotel Folios
Supercharge your travel & expense management product with a wealth of data minus the tedious data entry.

W-2 Tax Form β
Extract every drop of tax data from W2s in seconds. Including handwritten notes, checkboxes and multi-lines.

Cards β
Capture and extract data Credit Cards, Business Cards and Healthcare Insurance Cards in seconds.

More: https://www.veryfi.com/

founders.name: Dmitry Birulia, Founder
founders.description:
2017: Cofounded Veryfi to build Stripe for Data Extraction & Transformation   
2010: Led 3 Engineering teams at Coupons, Inc. (NYSE: QUOT). Experienced evolution of the company from a Startup to IPO   
2009: Came to the US from Belarus   
2006: Master's Degree in Computer Science

founders.name: Ernest Semerda, Founder
founders.description:
2017: Cofounded Veryfi to build the world’s most experienced data extraction expert!
2012: Cofounded (Medlert, now VectorCare); a logistics & communication platform to connect hospitals to ambulances in the US #HealthTech. Today the software powers logistics & communication at Kaiser, Sutter, Emery et al.
2010: Led International Engineering at Coupons, Inc. (now Quotient Technologies NYSE: QUOT). Got to experience the journey from startup to a $2B IPO.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Veryfi, Inc.**

**Mission:** Veryfi aims to liberate trapped data in unstructured documents through powerful APIs, transforming the way businesses handle and extract data.

**Foundation and Growth:** Founded in 2017 and a participant in Y Combinator's W17 batch, Veryfi has rapidly cultivated a reputation as a leader in data transformation technology. Located in San Mateo, California, the company has grown to a dedicated team of 60 employees.

**Product Offerings:**
Veryfi offers an integrated suite of tools designed to capture, extract, and transform data from various document types—including bills, receipts, and invoices—into actionable structured data within seconds. Here's a quick rundown of their core solutions:

- **APIs and Automation:** The platform's developer-friendly toolkits facilitate automated processes for expense management, accounts payable, and market research, making data entry faster and more reliable than human efforts.
  
- **Key Features:**
  - **Invoices, Bills & POs:** Process an invoice in just 5 seconds, significantly faster than the typical 10 minutes.
  - **Expense Receipts:** Simplifies reimbursements with compliance to data privacy regulations.
  - **FMCG/CPG Receipts:** Gain insights into consumer spending across retail in seconds.
  - **W-2 Tax Forms:** Extract detailed tax information swiftly.
  - **Business and Credit Cards:** Capture data from various card types seamlessly.

**Market Positioning and Use Cases:**
Veryfi has positioned itself at the intersection of machine learning and document automation, targeting industries such as finance, healthcare, real estate, and construction. Its solutions are highly adaptable for use in:
- **Expense Management** 
- **Automated AP/Bill Pay** 
- **Consumer Analytics**

**Security and Compliance:** Veryfi prides itself on high security standards and compliance with regulations such as SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, HIPAA, and CCPA, ensuring the utmost safety in data handling.

**Corporate Vision:** More than just a tool for businesses, Veryfi represents a shift toward harnessing data to unlock human potential, promoting a more efficient and insightful way to make decisions based on technological advancements.

**Conclusion:** In a world drowning in data, Veryfi cuts through the noise to deliver clarity, speed, and efficiency that empowers organizations to focus on growth and innovation. If you're curious about unleashing the potential of your data, you can dive deeper into their offerings at [Veryfi's official website](https://www.veryfi.com/).
